official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to permit the consideration of certain counties in the State of Hawaii for assistance under the urban development action grant program.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to make specified counties in Hawaii eligible for urban development action grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to permit the consideration of certain counties in the State of Hawaii for assistance under the urban development action grant program.
